definitions.title: the hinder side, back part
definitions.body: , in the sg., mostly in adverbial phrases:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as accus., in poetry backwards 23 t. ( = prose [[אֲחׂרַנִּית]]) with vbs. such as [[נׇפַל]] fall Ge 49:17, [[נׇשׂוֹג]] be turned 2Sa 1:22 (‖[[תָּשׁוּב]] [[רֵיקָם]]), [[שׁוּב]] Ps 9:4, Ps 56:10 +, [[נׇסוֹג]] Ps 35:4, Ps 40:15 + (of enemies repulsed), Ps 44:19, Is 50:5 (from obedience to God), [[נׇזוֹר]] Is 1:4, [[הֵשׁיב]] Is 44:25, Ps 44:11, [[הִכָּה]] Ps 78:66; behind (opp. [[קֶדֶם]]) Ps 139:5, Job 23:8; in the phrase [[פָּנִים]] [[וְאָחוֹר]] in front and behind † 1Ch 19:10 (altered from ´[[וּמֵאָ]] ´[[מִפָּ]] in 2 S v. infr.) 2Ch 13:14, Ez Eze 2:10.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בְּאָחוֹר]] † Pr 29:11, [[וְחָכָם בְּאָחוֹר יְשַׁבְּחֶנׇּה]] Ges Hi but a wise man stilleth it ([[רוּחַ]] anger) backwards (sc. when it would break forth), De in the background, sc. of his heart (‖[[כָּל־רוּחוֹ יוֹחִיא]] [[כְסִיל]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: † Ps 114:3, Ps 114:5, Je 7:24; (b) of time, hereafter (cf. [[לְפָנִים]] = before) † Is 41:23, Is 42:23.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[מֵאָחוֹר]] behind ([[מן]] = on the side of) † 2Sa 10:9 ´[[מִפָּנִים וּמֵ]] in front and behind, Is 9:11 ´[[וּפְלִשְׁתִּים מֵאָ]] and the Philistines behind (= on the West), opp. [[אֲרָם מִקֶּדֶם]]. †

definitions.title: hinder part
definitions.body: (of the tabernacle) Ex 26:12, (of a man or animal Ex 33:23, 1Ki 7:25 (= 2Ch 4:4) Ez Eze 8:16.
